## Voice.addEventListener() method

Generic event listener typings.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  voiceEvent | [Voice.Event](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.event_enum.md) | The raised event string. |
|  listener | [Voice.Listener.Generic](./twilio-voice-react-native.voice_namespace.listener_namespace.generic_typealias.md) | A listener function that will be invoked when the event is raised. |
